import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search ticket next steps"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/next-steps"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Performs a filtered and paginated search across all pending next steps in the system. Use this endpoint to identify bottlenecks or high-priority recommendations across multiple tickets or sites.

**Workflow Example**
1. Monitor workflow: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/search-ticket-next-steps) with filters for unassigned or overdue steps.
2. Iterate `Items[]` to identify targets for remediation or follow-up.

**Minimal Required Fields**: none (supports optional paging and filters via query parameters)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Next steps retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"A workflow-driven next step requirement associated with a ticket. Next steps represent actions or conditions that must be completed (resolved) before certain workflow transitions or ticket closure.","properties":{"TicketNextStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this next step."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier where this next step was created."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier for multi-product environments."},"TicketNextStepTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the next-step type (e.g., 'Requestor acknowledgment', 'Part ordered'). Obtain via [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types)."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent ticket identifier."},"IsResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the step has been resolved. Computed from ResolvedDate presence.","readOnly":true},"ResolvedById":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier who resolved the step.","nullable":true},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset identifier associated with the step resolution (e.g., for part replacement steps).","nullable":true},"AssetTag":{"type":"string","description":"Asset tag associated with the step resolution.","nullable":true},"ResolvedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the step was resolved. Null if not yet resolved.","nullable":true},"IsForceResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the step was force resolved (bypassed) by an administrator."},"Subject":{"type":"string","description":"Display name or subject for the step.","nullable":true},"ExternalId":{"type":"string","description":"Optional external reference ID for integration with external systems.","nullable":true},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Icon key used in the UI for visual representation.","nullable":true},"CanBeForceResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the step permits force resolution by administrators."},"CanBeUserResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the step can be resolved by end users (vs. only agents)."},"FilterSetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional filter set identifier used for dynamic resolution conditions.","nullable":true}},"required":["TicketNextStepId","SiteId","ProductId","TicketNextStepTypeId","TicketId"],"title":"TicketNextStep"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
